item.description: The Rosebud Bar and Grill plays host to Interactive Games how Style Trivia Wednesday Nights at 8pm. Its your chance to test your wits against others for a prize. This is interactive fast paced trivia buzz answers remotely, know your score at all times and as questions are asked via video displays thru out the bar. Great fun, food, drink and challenging. So come get your BUZZ on at the Rosebud Wednesday Nights 8pm.
item.name: Interactive Game Show Style Trivia Wednesday Nights 8pm
